mapper.sql: id, name, parent_id, layer, gmt_created, gmt_updated
mapper.update: update digcoo_anas_business set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, layer = #{layer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_updated = #{gmtUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
